item.title: cloudnative-pg
item.description:

item.title: grafana-operator
item.description:
Description

Grafana Operator is a Kubernetes operator that enables the installation and management of Grafana instances, dashboards and plugins.

  • https://github.com/bitnami/charts/tree/main/bitnami/grafana-operator

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
grafana-operator default âŒ â€” 44 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ðŸ¤– grafana-operator

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ðŸ”‘ Permissions (44)

item.title: kube-prometheus-stack
item.description:
Description

kube-prometheus-stack collects Kubernetes manifests, Grafana dashboards, and Prometheus rules combined with documentation and scripts to provide easy to operate end-to-end Kubernetes cluster monitoring with Prometheus using the Prometheus Operator.

  • https://github.com/prometheus-community/helm-charts
  • https://github.com/prometheus-operator/kube-prometheus

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
kube-prometheus-stack-grafana default âœ… â€” 2 3 Critical
kube-prometheus-stack-operator default âœ… â€” 30 1 Critical
kube-prometheus-stack-kube-state-metrics default âœ… â€” 32 1 Medium
kube-prometheus-stack-admission default âœ… â€” 3 2 Low
kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus default âœ… â€” 7 0 Low
kube-prometheus-stack-alertmanager default âœ… â€” 0 0 â€”
kube-prometheus-stack-grafana-test default âŒ â€” 0 1 â€”
kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus-node-exporter default âŒ â€” 0 1 â€”
kube-prometheus-stack-prometheus-windows-exporter default âŒ â€” 0 1 â€”

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.
